page.title: 05The Fiddler George Legend.
page.content: Anstey school badge shows a fiddler and dog.The legend is old but all the places can be visited today.George was playing his violin at the Chequers inn.The locals were talking of the Devils hole,a haunted cave.George thought the story stupid,he would walk the tunnel and prove it.Playing his fiddle,dog behind,he entered the cave. All was quiet.Suddenly screams came from the ground.The dog ran from the cave,every hair singed from it's body.George was never seen again.The legend was born.The castle mound,the Chequers and cave gate can be seen today.Old men of the village say that the path of the tunnel can be seen when it snows.
